short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension to quickly convert Big numbers (wei) to Ether and vice versa

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever frustrated when etherscan or any frontend shows number in wei and you need to convert it to ether quickly? Well this extension will solve that effectively.

A browser extension to quickly convert Big numbers (wei) to Ether and vice versa on any website

Supported Features
- Select any big number and press Alt+B (win) / option+B (mac)  to convert it to Ether
- By default it uses 18 decimals, but you can convert to any decimal you want
- Convert small number (Ether) to big number (wei)

The code is open sourced and you can find it here : https://github.com/KMKoushik/big-n

If you face any issue or you have any feature request, sumbit it here: https://github.com/KMKoushik/big-n/issues/new
